Mysql structure reader example
============
2020-01-31




Here is an example of how the **MysqlStructureReader** works, it analyzes this input:


```sql
-- MySQL Script generated by MySQL Workbench
-- Fri Jan 31 09:15:52 2020
-- Model: New Model    Version: 1.0
-- MySQL Workbench Forward Engineering

SET @OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS=@@UNIQUE_CHECKS, UNIQUE_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@@FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS, FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_SQL_MODE=@@SQL_MODE, SQL_MODE='TRADITIONAL,ALLOW_INVALID_DATES';

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema mydb
-- -----------------------------------------------------

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `luda_tag`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `luda_tag` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `luda_tag` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `name_UNIQUE` (`name` ASC))
ENGINE = InnoDB;




-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `luda_resource`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `luda_resource` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `luda_resource` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `lud_user_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `resource_identifier` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
  `dir` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
  `filename` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  `is_private` CHAR(1) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `fk_luda_resource_lud_user1_idx` (`lud_user_id` ASC),
  UNIQUE INDEX `resource_identifier_UNIQUE` (`resource_identifier` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_luda_resource_lud_user1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`lud_user_id`)
    REFERENCES `lud_user` (`id`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE CASCADE)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `luda_resource_has_tag`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `luda_resource_has_tag` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `luda_resource_has_tag` (
  `resource_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `tag_id` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`resource_id`, `tag_id`),
  INDEX `fk_luda_resource_has_luda_tag_luda_tag1_idx` (`tag_id` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_luda_resource_has_luda_tag_luda_resource_idx` (`resource_id` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_luda_resource_has_luda_tag_luda_resource`
    FOREIGN KEY (`resource_id`)
    REFERENCES `luda_resource` (`id`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_luda_resource_has_luda_tag_luda_tag1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`tag_id`)
    REFERENCES `luda_tag` (`id`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE CASCADE)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;


```


And produces this output:

```html
array(3) {
  [0] => array(9) {
    ["db"] => NULL
    ["table"] => string(8) "luda_tag"
    ["pk"] => array(1) {
      [0] => string(2) "id"
    }
    ["uind"] => array(1) {
      [0] => array(1) {
        [0] => string(4) "name"
      }
    }
    ["fkeys"] => array(0) {
    }
    ["columnNames"] => array(2) {
      [0] => string(2) "id"
      [1] => string(4) "name"
    }
    ["columnTypes"] => array(2) {
      ["id"] => string(3) "int"
      ["name"] => string(11) "varchar(64)"
    }
    ["columnNullables"] => array(2) {
      ["id"] => bool(false)
      ["name"] => bool(false)
    }
    ["ai"] => string(2) "id"
  }
  [1] => array(9) {
    ["db"] => NULL
    ["table"] => string(13) "luda_resource"
    ["pk"] => array(1) {
      [0] => string(2) "id"
    }
    ["uind"] => array(1) {
      [0] => array(1) {
        [0] => string(19) "resource_identifier"
      }
    }
    ["fkeys"] => array(1) {
      ["lud_user_id"] => array(3) {
        [0] => NULL
        [1] => string(8) "lud_user"
        [2] => string(2) "id"
      }
    }
    ["columnNames"] => array(6) {
      [0] => string(2) "id"
      [1] => string(11) "lud_user_id"
      [2] => string(19) "resource_identifier"
      [3] => string(3) "dir"
      [4] => string(8) "filename"
      [5] => string(10) "is_private"
    }
    ["columnTypes"] => array(6) {
      ["id"] => string(3) "int"
      ["lud_user_id"] => string(3) "int"
      ["resource_identifier"] => string(12) "varchar(128)"
      ["dir"] => string(12) "varchar(128)"
      ["filename"] => string(11) "varchar(64)"
      ["is_private"] => string(7) "char(1)"
    }
    ["columnNullables"] => array(6) {
      ["id"] => bool(false)
      ["lud_user_id"] => bool(false)
      ["resource_identifier"] => bool(false)
      ["dir"] => bool(false)
      ["filename"] => bool(false)
      ["is_private"] => bool(false)
    }
    ["ai"] => string(2) "id"
  }
  [2] => array(9) {
    ["db"] => NULL
    ["table"] => string(21) "luda_resource_has_tag"
    ["pk"] => array(2) {
      [0] => string(11) "resource_id"
      [1] => string(6) "tag_id"
    }
    ["uind"] => array(0) {
    }
    ["fkeys"] => array(2) {
      ["resource_id"] => array(3) {
        [0] => NULL
        [1] => string(13) "luda_resource"
        [2] => string(2) "id"
      }
      ["tag_id"] => array(3) {
        [0] => NULL
        [1] => string(8) "luda_tag"
        [2] => string(2) "id"
      }
    }
    ["columnNames"] => array(2) {
      [0] => string(11) "resource_id"
      [1] => string(6) "tag_id"
    }
    ["columnTypes"] => array(2) {
      ["resource_id"] => string(3) "int"
      ["tag_id"] => string(3) "int"
    }
    ["columnNullables"] => array(2) {
      ["resource_id"] => bool(false)
      ["tag_id"] => bool(false)
    }
    ["ai"] => NULL
  }
}




```
